data.name: WarpDescription
data.value: Teleports the player to the location marked on the map. It is sometimes buried in the ground, but it is normal.

data.name: SupplierDescription
data.value: When the player is resurrected after death or at the start of a mission, “Armor,” “ Health,” and “Special Ability Gauge” are all restored.

data.name: AutoHealDescription
data.value: After a while of not having taken any damage, it gradually recovers its strength and armor to the maximum value.

data.name: BondCarDescription
data.value: Simultaneously pressing “Aim” and “Fire” while in the “ Unarmed” state will fire missiles from the vehicle.

data.name: BgmDescription
data.value: Play background music during the activation of Trevor's ability. Play background music while Trevor's ability is activated. Place the BGM you wish to play as a wav file in “scripts/SpecialAbilityBgm”.

data.name: DeathSfxDescription
data.value: Play sound effects when the player dies. Place the sound effects you wish to play as wav files in “scripts/Pichun”.

data.name: VehicleHUDDescription
data.value:
Displays the vehicle's endurance value on the screen.
Red: Fuel tank Blue: body of the vehicle Green: Engine Yellow: Time remaining before explosion

data.name: EmergencyEscapeDescription
data.value: Getting out of the car while honking the horn activates the emergency ejection.

data.name: FloatingDescription
data.value: Holding down jump and sprint at the same time causes the player to fluff up and jump up.

data.name: NoWantedLevel
data.value: Disable Wanted level below this value.

data.name: PlayerInvincibleDescription
data.value: The player is temporarily invincible when resurrected after death or at the start of a mission.

data.name: AlertHealthDescription
data.value: The screen turns red to warn when the player's health is below a certain value.

data.name: NitroDescription
data.value: Instantly accelerates the player's vehicle. Used to “hand brake”, “accelerate”, and “hide” while in the vehicle. Left stick up/down to change angle.

data.name: NitroStraightVelocity
data.value: Instantaneous velocity applied (when NOT changing angle)

data.name: PlayerInvincibleAdd
data.value: Gives the player invincibility. No effects.
